title: Martin Luther King and Malcolm X - compare

content.question: Martin Luther King, Jr., and Malcolm X shared the view that

choices.label: the movement for Black advancement in the United States was part of a global process of social change
it was desirable to work for the desegregation of public facilities
violence was a necessary part of the movement for Black social and political advancement
using the courts to challenge the constitutionality of barriers to Black advancement was not a useful strategy

content.answer: the movement for Black advancement in the United States was part of a global process of social change

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
